{{Infobox battle item |name = Held Items |image = [[File:Held Items Modal.png|thumb|301px]] |caption = The Held Items modal |location = Johto }} ==Description== '''Held Items''' are items that Pokémon can equip for bonuses to their statistics. A held item only boosts an ''individual Pokémon ==Usage== Held Items can be found in an tab on the Item menu. You can only have six Pokémon holding Held Items at once, and you can't use a single item type more than once simultaneously. A Held Item is consumed when equipped and '''cannot be re-used''' - it will be removed from your inventory when it is unequipped.
To equip Held Items your Pokémon will typically need to meet some requirement. For example, to equip the Black Belt your desired Pokémon must be a Fighting type. To equip the Macho Brace your Pokémon must be at least ''Contagious'' with Pokérus. ==Acquisition== Held items can be found in [[Shops]], as Loot in [[Dungeons]] and as [[Rare Hold Items]] from Pokémons. ==List of items== {|class="wikitable sortable" !
